item.title: Friday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The major averages tanked on Thursday, posting their worst session since 2020 after President Trump rolled out a raft of tariffs. What's on CNBC's rad...

item.title: Find safe portfolio income in these assets as the Trump tariff rollout rattles stocks
item.description: Investors shouldn't flee stocks even as the major averages swoon. There are places to find safe yield — depending on a person's goals and timeline.

item.title: Chipmakers get a reprieve from tariffs, but tumbling stocks suggest risks remain
item.description: More concerning than potential tariffs on semiconductors is the possiblity demand could collapse.

item.title: Playing defense: These stable stocks should be trade war-proof and generate income
item.description: Defense stock General Dynamics is one company that might prove a hedge against tariff-induced risks.

item.title: Investors should stay away from risk right now after Trump's tariff announcement, says Citi's Kate Moore
item.description: Moore's comments come after President Donald Trump signed a tariff plan that imposes steep levies on many countries.
